name: ListDialingPermissionsCountry
description: Retrieve all voice dialing country permissions for this account

IsoCode.description: Filter to retrieve the country permissions by specifying the [ISO country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

Continent.description: Filter to retrieve the country permissions by specifying the continent

LowRiskNumbersEnabled.description: Filter to retrieve the country permissions with dialing to low-risk numbers enabled. Can be: `true` or `false`.

HighRiskSpecialNumbersEnabled.description: Filter to retrieve the country permissions with dialing to high-risk special service numbers enabled. Can be: `true` or `false`

HighRiskTollfraudNumbersEnabled.description: Filter to retrieve the country permissions with dialing to high-risk [toll fraud](https://www.twilio.com/blog/how-to-protect-your-account-from-toll-fraud-with-voice-dialing-geo-permissions-html) numbers enabled. Can be: `true` or `false`.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
